_dc:description: Persistent identifier used to identify a trait measurement trial.
Unique number in the dataset for the measurement trial.
_examples: Local identifier for the measurement trial

_dc:description: The year of the trait measurement trial.
A reference to a report of the trial field season, could be supplied as the URL to the report online or as the file name or bibliographic citation string.
Information relevant for the interpretation of the scores in the trial season such as weather conditions or experimental design.
_examples: Experimental design, location, experimentor, weather, etc

_dc:description: An identifier for the set of location information (data associated with dcterms:Location). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.
